scenes.visual: The video begins with a black-and-white shot of Donald Trump standing at a podium labeled 'TECH PROSPERITY DEAL' alongside Keir Starmer. They are in a formal room with wood-paneled walls, adorned with framed portraits and a floral arrangement. The American and British flags are prominently displayed behind them. A reporter is seen asking a question, and the camera captures the audience seated in front of the podiums.

The scene transitions to a slightly elevated camera angle, providing a view of the audience seated in front of the podiums. A reporter is seen asking a question, positioned among the audience, facing the podiums. The setting appears formal, with both leaders attentively listening to the reporter's question. The background includes framed portraits and a floral arrangement, adding to the official atmosphere of the event.

The camera angle remains static, showing Donald Trump and Keir Starmer standing at their respective podiums. The background features US and UK flags, and there are portraits and a piano visible. Both Trump and Starmer are looking down at their notes. The room has a formal setting with wood-paneled walls and a floral arrangement.

The scene continues with Donald Trump and Keir Starmer standing at their respective podiums. The background features US and UK flags, and there are portraits and a piano visible. A reporter is asking a question, and both Trump and Starmer are listening attentively. The camera angle remains steady, focusing on the two leaders as they prepare to respond.

Keir Starmer is speaking while Donald Trump listens attentively. The camera remains consistent, focusing on both individuals as they engage in the press conference. The setting is formal, with both leaders dressed in suits, and the audience is visible in the foreground, indicating a press conference environment.

The setting appears to be a formal press conference room, with the US and UK flags prominently displayed behind the podiums.
